page.title: 06BAGILT INDUSTRY
page.content: Bagillt used to have one of the largest lead smelting works in the world.Pig lead was exported even as far as America.Ships left the local docks for Bristol,Liverpool,Chester. There were local lead works in the immediate area.The last lead works closed in 1900. .Bagillt was also known for its collieries.The last one closed in 1934 .Most of the local people either worked in the lead works or collieries. More recently,most of the people used to work at Shotton steel works(Shotton)and at Courtaulds(Flint and Greenfield).Courtaulds made rayon and viscose.Many people became redundant when Courtaulds(Flint) closed and Shotton steel works partly closed.Locally there is 68% unemployment.
